title: Pervomaysky, Kalachyovsky District, Volgograd Oblast
text:
Pervomaysky () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">khutor</a>) in Logoskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Kalachyovsky%20District">Kalachyovsky District</a>, <a href="Volgograd%20Oblast">Volgograd Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 226 as of 2010. There are 9 streets.
Geography.
Pervomaysky is located 75 km southwest of <a href="Kalach-na-Donu">Kalach-na-Donu</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Logovsky is the nearest rural locality.
